story.iWant: the interface to work perfectly on any device and be fully accessible
story.soThat: everyone can use SpendSense regardless of device or ability
story.tasks: Responsive breakpoints (mobile/tablet/desktop/wide), keyboard navigation (tab order, focus states, escape closes, arrow keys), WCAG 2.1 AA compliance (4.5:1 contrast, focus visible, color+icon indicators, form labels, ARIA labels), skeleton loaders, touch targets (44x44px), smooth transitions (300ms, prefers-reduced-motion), ARIA live regions, screen reader testing (VoiceOver/NVDA), Lighthouse accessibility audit (95+ score)

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 10 criteria: 4 responsive breakpoints, keyboard navigation, WCAG AA compliance (contrast, focus, no color-only, labels, ARIA), skeleton loaders (not spinners), touch targets 44x44px, smooth transitions (respect prefers-reduced-motion), ARIA live regions, screen reader testing, responsive grid behavior (4→2→1 columns), Lighthouse 95+ score

artifact.title: UX Spec
artifact.snippet: Breakpoints: 320px mobile, 768px tablet, 1024px desktop, 1440px wide. Touch targets 44x44px. WCAG 2.1 AA. Skeleton loaders. prefers-reduced-motion support

constraint.rule: WCAG 2.1 AA: 4.5:1 contrast, all interactive elements have visible focus (2px blue outline), no color-only indicators (always pair with icon/label), form labels associated, ARIA labels on icon-only buttons
4 breakpoints with specific grid behaviors: Mobile 320-767px (1-col), Tablet 768-1023px (2-col), Desktop 1024-1439px (3-4 col), Wide 1440px+ (max-width 1400px container)

interface.name: Tailwind responsive utilities
interface.description: Use for responsive grid layouts (e.g., grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4)

tests.standards: Comprehensive testing: Run Lighthouse audit (target 95+ accessibility score), test keyboard navigation (tab order logical, escape closes modals, arrow keys in lists), test screen reader (VoiceOver on macOS or NVDA on Windows - all content navigable), verify responsive behavior at all 4 breakpoints, check touch targets 44x44px on mobile, verify color contrast 4.5:1 minimum, test transitions respect prefers-reduced-motion

ideas.test: Lighthouse 95+ score, keyboard nav complete, screen reader works, responsive grids work (4→2→1), touch targets 44x44px, contrast passes, reduced-motion respected
